title: Webly Supervised Learning of Convolutional Networks
authors: X Chen, A Gupta - arXiv preprint arXiv:1505.01554
excerpt: Abstract: In the last few years, we have made enormous progress in learning visual representations via convolutional neural networks (CNNs). We believe CNNs get their edge due to their ability to imbibe large amounts of data. Therefore, as we move forward a key  ...
